to explain; to comment; to annotate
объяснить; комментировать; комментировать
rtega_mnemonic:
詮詮RS
诠诠		explain, expound, comment on, truth, discussion

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 诠)
Pictophonetic: 全 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
詮釋 [ quán shì ]: to interpret; to comment and explain; to annotate; to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role); to decode; interpretation; annotation
詮註 [ quán zhù ]: notes and commentary; exegesis
詮釋學 [ quán shì xué ]: hermeneutics
詮釋資料 [ quán shì zī liào ]: metadata
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 全 [ quán ] whole, entire, complete; to preserve
heisig_constituent: elucidate, say, words, keitai, mouth, whole, umbrella, king, jewel, ball
heisig_story: Think of elucidating as presenting something in whole words, as distinct from broken fragmented sentences.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: discussion, methods called for, selection, result
koohiiStory1: Words that tell you the results of the whole story really elucidate.
koohiiStory2: Elucidate me. Tell me, in your own words, the whole story.
kunYomi: せん.ずる、かい、あき.らか

humanum_full_description_en:
From " yan " to " full " sound, the original meaning is detailed explanation and clarification. "Shuowen": "With Ye. From the words, the whole sound." "Huainanzi-Yaolue": "Changing the singularity of the subtle words, the interpretation and even the rationale."

" Annotation " can express truth and the law of things. "Huainanzi·Binglue Xun": "Faith must be interpreted and words must be combined."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " yan " and " quan ", the original meaning is detailed explanation and clarification.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「全」聲，本義為詳盡解釋、闡明。《說文》：「具也。从言，全聲。」《淮南子‧要略》：「差擇微言之眇，詮以至理之文。」

　　「詮」可表示道理、事物的規律。《淮南子‧兵略訓》：「發必中詮，言必合數。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「全」聲，本義為詳盡解釋、闡明。

詮詮RS
诠诠 		explain, expound, comment on, truth, discussion
  • say 言 everything 全 about something
(Simplified: 诠)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 全 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 全 [ quán ] whole, entire, complete; to preserve
①解釋：詮解。詮註。詮釋。詮證。詮言。詮次(ａ．條理、層次，如“辭無詮詮”；b．選擇和編排，如“詮詮不精，致有差誤”)。
②事物的理：直詮(即真理)。發必中(zhòng)詮(說出話來必定符合事理)。詮有專長。博詮多才。
③分門別類的有系統的知識：詮說。哲詮。數詮。
詮釋 [ quán shì ]: to interpret; to comment and explain; to annotate; to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role); to decode; interpretation; annotation
詮註 [ quán zhù ]: notes and commentary; exegesis
詮釋學 [ quán shì xué ]: hermeneutics
詮釋資料 [ quán shì zī liào ]: metadata

Lesson: 15 frameNoV4: 2717 frameNoV6: 360 Strokes: 13 Jouyou Grade: JH 

從「 言 」，「 全 」聲，本義為詳盡解釋、闡明。《說文》：「具也。从言，全聲。」《淮南子‧要略》：「差擇微言之眇，詮以至理之文。」 「 詮 」可表示道理、事物的規律。《淮南子‧兵略訓》：「發必中詮，言必合數。」
From " yan" to " full" sound, the original meaning is detailed explanation and clarification. "Shuowen": "With Ye. From the words, the whole sound." "Huainanzi-Yaolue": "Changing the singularity of the subtle words, the interpretation and even the rationale." " Annotation" can express truth and the law of things. "Huainanzi·Binglue Xun": "Faith must be interpreted and words must be combined."

詮字的基本解释

詮
quán
见“诠”。

詮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quán］
［《廣韻》此緣切，平仙，清。］
“诠1”的繁体字。
(1)详尽解释；阐明。
(2)道理，事物的规律。
(3)通“銓”。犹衡量，考虑。
(4)通“銓”。铨选，选择。参见“詮次”、“詮擇”。
(5)用同“跧”。低下。参见“詮才末學”。
(6)全。太平天囯避洪秀全名讳，凡用“全”字的地方，均以“銓”、“詮”等字替代。
(7)文体名。史传论赞的别称。

詮字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　詮； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1158第04
【唐韻】此緣切【集韻】【韻會】逡緣切【正韻】且緣切，?音銓。【說文】具也。【玉篇】治亂之體也。【廣韻】平也。【類篇】擇言也。又解喩也。【晉書·武陔傳】文帝數與詮論。【音義】謂具說事理也。【?書·傅縡傳】言爲心使，心受言詮。【吳越春秋】惟夫子詮斯義也。【註】擇言也。【杜甫·秋日詠懷詩】衣褐向眞詮。　又【淮南子·詮言訓註】詮，就也。就萬物之指，以言其徵，事之所謂，道之所依也。　又【金史·選舉志】凡會試，詮讀官二員。

Interpretation
Basic explanation of words
Interpretation
quán
See "Interpretation".
Interpretation
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［quán］
["Guangyun" this edge cut, Pingxian, Qing. ]
Traditional characters for "調1".
(1) Detailed explanation; clarification.
(2) Reason, the law of things.
(3) Through "Quan". Still weigh and consider.
(4) Through "Quan". Choose, choose. See "Quan Time", "Quan Choice".
(5) Use the same as "跧". low. See "Explanation of Talents and Final Learning".
(6) Full. The Taiping Heavenly Kingdom avoided the taboo of Hongxiu's full name, and wherever the word "quan" was used, the words "quan" and "quan" were used instead.
(7) The name of the style. Another name for historical biography.
Interpretation
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　 Quan; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1158 Page 04
[Tang Yun] This edge cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] The edge cut [Zheng Yun] and the edge cut,? Yin Quan. [Said Wen] Gu Ye. [Jade articles] The body of fighting chaos. [Guang Yun] Ping also. [Classes] Choose words. It's also a solution. 【Book of Jin·WuGai Biography】The number and interpretation of Emperor Wen. [Pronunciation] It means that it is reasonable. [? Book·Fu Xi Biography] Words are the enlightenment of the heart, and the heart is interpreted by words. [Wu Yue Chun Qiu] But the master interprets all the meanings. [Note] Select words. 【Du Fu·Autumn Song Huai Poems】Annotation of clothes and browns.　[Huainanzi·Annotation and Commentary] Annotation, that's it. As far as the meaning of all things are concerned, they are based on words, things are called things, and Tao depends on them.　[Gold History·Election History] The two members of the interpreter for every examination.
